description: A 2nd year and a friend of Sae since childhood. She just wants to be a normal high school girl and gets frustrated with Sae`s obsession with the Magic Club, although she is proficient in magic herself. Nanaka has a crush on Aburatsubo but is afraid to admit her feelings because she knows they won`t be returned. She describes her family as "all over the place", and though often embarrassed and aggravated by their antics, she loves them dearly. (wiki)
name: Nakatomi Nanaka
